author: Sam-Harper
body: This is the 72X edition of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6479 which removes a spurious error message from GsfElectron::ecalDriven() that no longer makes sense given which flags are currently filled in 7X. It has no other effect on the results of the function.
title: removing spurious error message from GsfElectron::ecalDriven()  72X
